alert.note: Alert for Pulaski; Wayne (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 09 at 7:13PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 915 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of south central Kentucky, including the following counties, Pulaski and Wayne. * WHEN...Until 915 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 712 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to slow-moving thunderstorms. Excessive rainfall will cause minor flooding of small streams and creeks, roads, and roadside culverts. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Somerset, Burnside, Pulaski County Park, Frazer, Nancy, Naomi, Somerset Pulaski Airport, Elihu, Mill Springs, Betsey, Trimble and Ferguson.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
